name: MyChatter
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my chatter
des: Connect your Salesforce org to Alexa within the Alexa Companion App & then you can ask Alexa to play your chatter posts, ones that you are mentioned on. The purpose of this skill is to keep you up to speed with the posts that your colleagues send to you, so you can listen to them & action them conveniently.
